paragraphs.text: According to all known laws of avaiation, there is no way a bee should be able to fly. Its wings are too large to get its fat little body off the ground. The bee, of course, flies anyway, because bees don't care what humans think is impossible.

We're no strangers to love. You know the rules, and so do I. A full commitment's what I'm thinking of. You wouldn't get this from any other guy. I just want to tell you how I'm feeling. Got to make you understand.
